PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-14822018-11-29ECCC,  HC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Limiting Carbon Dioxide Emissions from Natural Gas-fired Generation of Electricity
PrecisRegulations Limiting CARBON DIOXIDE EMISSIONS FROM NATURAL GAS-FIRED GENERATION OF ELECTRICITY in order to limit CO2 emissions from natural gas-fired electricity generation by ensuring new and significantly modified natural gas-fired electricity units are subject to emission performance standards.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0261 Publication Date: 2018-12-12
AttachmentsAttachment
